product_description: Tonal embroidery trims the popover neckline of a flowy maxi dress that will take you from brunch with friends to backyard parties or a tropical vacay.
product_details_and_care:
Tonal embroidery trims the popover neckline of a flowy maxi dress that will take you from brunch with friends to backyard parties or a tropical vacay.

product_size_info:
Sizes XXS-XS are true to size; sizes S-M if between sizes, size down; and sizes L-XXL run large.
The sizing is unique (just like you), so choose your best fit after taking a look at our size chart.
XXS=00, XS=0-2, S=4-6, M=8-10, L=12-14, XL=16-18 (14W), XXL=20 (16W).
